PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-07012012-05-31,  ,  ,  ,  CIC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of MICHAEL HAMELIN of Kirkland, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year; and designation of MICHAEL HAMELIN to be Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office); effective June 23, 2012.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of MICHAEL HAMELIN of Kirkland, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year; and designation of MICHAEL HAMELIN to be Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office); effective June 23, 2012.
